title: paragraph 5(5) (as amended by section 4 of the Milk (Regulation of Supply)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Milk Agency (Conduct
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the National Milk Agency (Conduct 

of Elections) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited national milk agency (conduct elections) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: paragraph 5(5) (as amended by section 4 of the Milk (Regulation of Supply)
heading: 2. The National Milk Agency (Conduct of Elections) Regulations 1997 (S.
text_raw:
2. The National Milk Agency (Conduct of Elections) Regulations 1997 (S. 

I. No. 185 of 1997) are amended by: 

(a) 

substituting for Regulation 4(2) (as amended by the National Milk 
Agency (Conduct of Elections) (Amendment) Regulations 2018 
(S.I. No. 262 of 2018), the following- 

“(2) (a) The registered producers who have supplied raw milk 
for heat treatment for liquid consumption to one or 
more of the following- 

(i) Glanbia Ireland DAC, 

(ii) Lakeland Dairies Co-Operative Society 

Limited, 

(iii) Aurivo Co-operative Society Limited, 

(iv) Glenisk Limited 

comprise a constituency and are entitled to elect 3 producer 
members to the Board of the National Milk Agency, and 

(b) The registered producers who have supplied raw milk 
for heat treatment for liquid consumption to one or 
more of the following – 

(i) The Village Dairy Limited, 

(ii) Bainne Codladh Ltd., 

(iii) Arrabawn Co-operative Society Limited, 

(iv) Clona Dairy Products Limited, 

(v) Dairygold Co-operative Society Limited (as 

agent for Glanbia Plc), 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [373] 3 

(vi) Dawn Dairies Limited and Kerry Creameries 
Limited T/A Kerry Creameries – Dairies, 

(vii) Lee Strand Co-operative Creamery Limited, 

(viii) North Cork Co-operative Creameries Limited, 

(ix) Centenary Thurles Co-operative Society 

Limited (Thurles Fresh Milk Limited) 

comprise a constituency and are entitled to elect 2 producer 
members to the Board of the National Milk Agency.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 July, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [373]
text_norm: 2 national milk agency (conduct elections) regulation 1997 (s i no 185 1997) amended (a) substituting regulation 4(2) (as amended national milk agency (conduct elections) (amendment) regulation 2018 (s.i no 262 2018) following- (2) (a) registered producer supplied raw milk heat treatment liquid consumption one following- (i) glanbia ireland dac (ii) lakeland dairy co-operative society limited (iii) aurivo co-operative society limited (iv) glenisk limited comprise constituency entitled elect 3 producer member board national milk agency (b) registered producer supplied raw milk heat treatment liquid consumption one following - (i) village dairy limited (ii) bainne codladh ltd (iii) arrabawn co-operative society limited (iv) clona dairy product limited (v) dairygold co-operative society limited (as agent glanbia plc) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 23rd july 2021 373 3 (vi) dawn dairy limited kerry creamery limited kerry creamery - dairy (vii) lee strand co-operative creamery limited (viii) north cork co-operative creamery limited (ix) centenary thurles co-operative society limited (thurles fresh milk limited) comprise constituency entitled elect 2 producer member board national milk agency  given official seal 13 july 2021 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine 4 373

title: paragraph 5(5) (as amended by section 4 of the Milk (Regulation of Supply)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to establish constituencies for the election 
of producer representatives to the National Milk Agency. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [373] 5
